attributes.action: Support Freedom of speech & welcome Donald Trump into UK
attributes.additional_details: This petition is in direct response to the one calling on the government to ban Donald Trump.Certain individuals and groups do not have the right to ban somebody just because they do not agree with their political views.
attributes.background: We live in a society that is built upon democracy and freedom of speech,therefore everyone should have the right to express their views accordingly.By welcoming Donald Trump openly to the UK,we are endorsing these principles.There are those who oppose Mr Trump's views but just as many support them.
